posts.name: SaferDev - Device Information & SafetyNet Status Checker
posts.description: SaferDev is a hardware and software information app & SafetyNet compatibility status checker app for Android devices.
posts.changelog: -  Fresh design inspired by Android 12 wallpaper theming also supports dark & light theming.

posts.name: Lineage-19.0-20211229-UNOFFICIAL-begonia.zip
posts.changelog: - Initial Build. - December security patch. - Prebuilt GrapheneOS Camera.

posts.name: ProjectSakura-5.2-GAPPS-Basic-20210923-2016-begonia-OFFICIAL.zip
posts.changelog: - 5.2 Update based on Lineage 18.1. - September Security Patch. - SElinux Enforcing. - Enable VNDK runtime isolation. - Update kernel from begonia-r-oss. - Kernel upstream from to 4.14.246. - Inlined kernel modules. - Update firmware begonia V12.5.3.0.RGGMIXM. - Update audio configs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update blobs from begonia V12.5.3.0.RGGMIXM. - Update media configs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMXM - Update seccomp configs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update public.libraries from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update permissions from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update rootdir from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update dtbo certs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update properties from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Turn on BOARD_USES_METADATA_PARTITION. - Enforce RRO for all resource overlays.

posts.name: HyconOS_4.5.1_begonia-11.0-20210926-0432-OFFICIAL.zip
posts.changelog: - September Security Patch. - FW Included. - SElinux Enforcing. - Safety Net passed by default. - Enable VNDK runtime isolation. - Update kernel from begonia-r-oss. - Kernel upstream from to 4.14.246. - Inlined kernel modules. - begonia: overlay: Update brightness values from redfin. - Fixed Night Light Flickering. - Update firmware begonia V12.5.3.0.RGGMIXM. - Update audio configs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update blobs from begonia V12.5.3.0.RGGMIXM. - Update media configs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMXM. - Update seccomp configs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update public.libraries from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update permissions from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update rootdir from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update dtbo certs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update properties from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Turn on BOARD_USES_METADATA_PARTITION. - Enforce RRO for all resource over.

posts.name: HyconOS_4.5.1_begonia-11.0-20210926-0432-OFFICIAL.zip
posts.changelog: - September Security Patch. - FW Included. - SElinux Enforcing. - Safety Net passed by default. - Enable VNDK runtime isolation. - Update kernel from begonia-r-oss. - Kernel upstream from to 4.14.246. - Inlined kernel modules. - begonia: overlay: Update brightness values from redfin. - Fixed Night Light Flickering. - Update firmware begonia V12.5.3.0.RGGMIXM. - Update audio configs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update blobs from begonia V12.5.3.0.RGGMIXM. - Update media configs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMXM. - Update seccomp configs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update public.libraries from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update permissions from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update rootdir from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update dtbo certs from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Update properties from begonia V12.5.1.0.RGGMIXM. - Turn on BOARD_USES_METADATA_PARTITION. - Enforce RRO for all resource over.
